item.title: Personal Web Presentation
item.description: Overview: A static website to showcase projects, inititatives, learnings and fun stuff. Project State: In development. Used Technologies: hugo a framework for building static websites coder template for the hugo framework github actions for automated deployment. github pages for hosting on my own domain. TODOs add more projects Source: The source code can be found on my github.
